data.title: Mormon Literature & Creative Arts Database
data.text:
Nellie W. Neal

Biography

Nellie Ward Neal was born April 23, 1903 in North Ogden, Utah. She was the daughter of Lorenzo "Ren" and Mary Emeline Barker Ward. She married Roosevelt Neal.

Also Known As

Nellie Ward Neal

Religion

LDS

Connection to Mormonism

LDS (member of the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints)

Spouse

Roosevelt Neal

1903-04-22

North Ogden, Utah

Death Date

1997-08-01

Female
